# Functional Docs

> Documentation for Functional Docs.

*Topics available: 3*

- [Deconstructing tuples and other types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/functional/deconstruct.md): Learn how to deconstruct tuples and other types.
- [Discards](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/functional/discards.md): Describes C#'s support for discards, which are unassigned, discardable variables, and the ways in which discards can be used.
- [Pattern matching overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/functional/pattern-matching.md): Learn about pattern matching expressions in C#
